title: Flipped Learning-Based Question Generation and Analysis Training for Pre-Service Physics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Physics Concepts and Fundamental Pedagogical Knowledge
context.additional_context: Cultivating question-generation and analytical skills to enhance understanding of physics education content via flipped learning in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three physics education-related questions (covering concepts, applications, experiments, etc.) in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can classify the difficulty levels (low, medium, high) of generated questions and analyze them based on appropriate feedback criteria.
Learners can improve their question-generation skills by over 20% using peer assessment and iterative learning strategies in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
